InfiCare Technologies is a  global software product development company based in New Delhi and in Washington DC metro area for 15 years. InfiCare’s focuses on custom software development, web and mobility solutions. InfiCare has about 180 employees in India and US servicing commercial, not-for-profit and government customers.
We have a mature team that delivers applications that are architected well, have intuitive user interface and efficient code. Our team delivers high quality projects and on time. Our pricing from India office is very competitive. Beyond coding, our project managers often suggest improvising functionalities that add value to your project. We juse a project tracking and task management portal. We are a Developer Partner for Apple and is also Android Developer Partner.
Our team brings deep understanding of processes, interfaces and technologies in use in many verticals. In October of 2015, InfiCare was chosen by Silicon India as Top 100 Tech Companies Founded by Indians in the USA. http://www.inficaretech.com/press-releases/2015top100/
